mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ProcessCode (sequence_no, code, error_code, process_abbreviation, process_alias, process_type, standard, standard_working_time, fake_fault_warning, genuine_fault_warning, repeatable) VALUES (#{sequenceNo}, #{code}, #{errorCode}, #{processAbbreviation}, #{processAlias}, #{processType}, #{standard}, #{standardWorkingTime}, #{fakeFaultWarning}, #{genuineFaultWarning}, #{repeatable})
mapper.update: UPDATE ProcessCode SET code = #{code}, error_code = #{errorCode}, process_abbreviation = #{processAbbreviation}, process_alias = #{processAlias}, process_type = #{processType}, standard = #{standard}, standard_working_time = #{standardWorkingTime}, fake_fault_warning = #{fakeFaultWarning}, genuine_fault_warning = #{genuineFaultWarning}, repeatable = #{repeatable} WHERE sequence_no = #{sequenceNo}
